Mobile technology for teams to practice, share and coach each other, anytime, anywhere.

Book a demo

Easily integrate personal & professional development into everyday business life.

How it works?

1Create & share scenarios

2Practice, record & submit

3Review feedback & share

Features

Coaching criteria

Define criteria that reflect the desired observable performance from your team.

Reporting

Measure and manage your team and team members performance, coaching and training needs.

Encourage coaching culture

Intuitive interface to create practice scenarios and share with team members.

Multi-language support

For fast and economic international deployments.

Enterprise ready

Mirror structure geographically and functionally. Data metrics for performance & participation to complement LMS & CRM.

Social learning

Share best practice among team members, where everyone is the student, and everyone is the teacher.

Accessibility & convenience

Practice, record, review and coach offline.

Native functionality with secure access

To ensure unrivalled user experience.

Integration

Integration with your LMS and CRM systems to provide greater cross analysis.
